channel.title: Smart Mod Problem
channel.description:
Hello, I hope someone can help me here. Since the Update 4, i have the problem that Satisfactoy does not start with the SMART Mod. I have all updates installed. At startup it always shows me these error messages....
![2021-05-01|379x500](upload://wMTQ4XOKSr9bKxfKXpOkhTsMRzw.png)
....What have I done wrong. Thank you for interest.

item.title: Smart Mod Problem
item.dc:creator: @Jeppe_Achton_Nielsen Jeppe Achton Nielsen
item.description:
@Jeppe_Achton_Nielsen wrote:

Alright, it is a known issue with SML. We need to wait or use experimental mode. From the discord:

" SML 3.1.0 just released, and it fixes that crash, alongside some other fixes and changes.

This version of SML is only compatible with the build 151773 (and up) of the game, this means that it is currently only compatible with the Experimental branch of the game. Because of this, we suggest you switch to using that branch while waiting for it to merge back into the Early Access branch.

Some mods may have become broken because of the SML update. We already know about Micro Manage and Smart. The fix is simple and those mods will likely be updated again. But as always, please do not ask for ETAs. Mod updates will come when they come.

Please remember that all of the mods are made by volunteers who do this in their spare time ! Happy modding everyone!"

Read full topic

item.title: Smart Mod Problem
item.dc:creator: @Jeppe_Achton_Nielsen Jeppe Achton Nielsen
item.description:
@Jeppe_Achton_Nielsen wrote:

I tried updating to SML 3.1.0 alone, seems there is a version issue going on:

2021-05-09 01:26:51:955 [DEBUG] SML@3.1.0 is not good: Game version incompatible. Installed: 151248. SML requires >=151773 Trace:
Error: Game version incompatible. Installed: 151248. SML requires >=151773
at LockfileGraph.validate (C:\SMM\Satisfactory Mod Manager\resources\app.asar\node_modules\satisfactory-mod-manager-api\lib\lockfile.js:94:23)
at async Array.forEachAsync (C:\SMM\Satisfactory Mod Manager\resources\app.asar\node_modules\satisfactory-mod-manager-api\lib\utils.js:212:9)
at async LockfileGraph.validate (C:\SMM\Satisfactory Mod Manager\resources\app.asar\node_modules\satisfactory-mod-manager-api\lib\lockfile.js:109:29)
at async C:\SMM\Satisfactory Mod Manager\resources\app.asar\node_modules\satisfactory-mod-manager-api\lib\manifest.js:164:13
at async Array.forEachAsync (C:\SMM\Satisfactory Mod Manager\resources\app.asar\node_modules\satisfactory-mod-manager-api\lib\utils.js:212:9)
at async Object.mutateManifest (C:\SMM\Satisfactory Mod Manager\resources\app.asar\node_modules\satisfactory-mod-manager-api\lib\manifest.js:158:5)
at async SatisfactoryInstall.checkForUpdates (C:\SMM\Satisfactory Mod Manager\resources\app.asar\node_modules\satisfactory-mod-manager-api\lib\satisfactoryInstall.js:261:44)

Read full topic
